content.detailedDescription: Driving down the freeway going west down i 10. sister saw some red fire balls took a closer look saw the traingle formation. pulled over and wawatch the balls of fire run across the sky and then disgrate, and then the next three showed up...Pulsting fire balls.Did close to the first.I though okay plane...But they have blinking lights on the wings...These balls of fire i have never see. living in housto. i see enoughs planes in my sky..Thay was no plain. just wanted to make a report
content.summary: Look like fire balls that did pulsate...Did not blike like a plane and to close to one another...Three fire balls that seem to have made a large traiangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
July 2 2016 10:30-11:00pm
ss norden club bridgeport connecticut
the fairfield fireworks had ended. the crowd was thinning out. the boats had all come back in. it was time for me to go fishing. i live on long island sound. i fish every night from april to january. if it happens in the night sky i see it! every moon. every meteor shower. every fireworks display. i was sitting at my usual spot facing the water. two friends were standing up facing me with their backs to the water. i looked up to engage one friend in conversation. over her left shoulder i saw a rather large slow moving oval shaped craft. it was illuminated white. it was blurred because it was flying in low cloud cover or possibly smoke hanging in the air from the fireworks. i watched it for about 10 seconds before it faded away into the cloud or smoke. it travelled slow and would have been following the shoreline heading south. as i'm watching this thing i'm going through the rolodex in my brain sorting through memories and experiences and what i know already. airplanes and helicopters have clear projected lights as well as red blinking lights. they also create sound. this was illuminated white and silent. i even thought of someone shining a spotlight into the sky. but the light would reflect off the cloud or smoke. none of that either. i've been here 25 years and no plane or helicopter has ever flown this bearing barring search and rescue. there was no search and rescue that night. i eliminated everything i thought it could be based on my experiences. what i am left with is actually a white walnut shaped slow and low moving craft over the shoreline of black rock harbor. has anyone else reported this?
content.summary: While fishing after the fairfield fireworks ended it noticed a white craft moving very slowly at low altitude over black rock harbor.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting outside with a group at 10:55 pm central time in muscoda wi, looked up saw bright orange object looked liked about 4 or 5 small bright lights together moving from southwest to northwest, we heard no sound seen no flashing lights like on a plane , all of us had no clue what this was, moving at a speed of about a small plane but this was different. we said as if it looked like a plane were on fire but moving right along.

i read another couple had seen the same thing in wisconsin same night but different city.

we kept trying to talk ourselves into what we saw was a plane but , this did not look like plane nor helicopter.
content.summary: No sound, bright orange lights not plane

content.detailedDescription: There were 5 of us adults and 2 children watching the fireworks from our 7th floor balcony.  one of us noticed a red stationary red ball in the sky just to the right of the fireworks somewhat higher in the sky.  it just hovered and did not move,we thought it was a plane and continued to watch it.  it suddenly went in a straight flight pattern and turned green and then red a few more times as it flew east and hovered again, then it swiftly flew out of sight behind some buildings and went southeast where we lost sight of it.  couldn't have been a helicopter or a plane.  a couple of minutes later we did see a plane, could have been coast guard jet (going really fast) fly in the direction of where the object was headed when we last saw it.
content.summary: Not sure what it was, we noticed it when we were watching fireworks, we thought it could have been a drone.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in our backyard and i looked up and saw a silver oval at about 50' above horizon. based on the plane that was near, it had to be at least at 10k feet. i pointed to it, she saw it, and it disappeared before our eyes.  there were no clouds. no flashing lights.
content.summary: Oval silver object at 50' above horizon. no flashing lights. no clouds. disappeared.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Over the last week my daughter, son-in-law and myself have sighted these glowing red/yellow and white balls moving across the sky, they were faster than a plane or helicopter would be able to go. the followed each other, sped up and slowed down. some would be far away and others would be really close. i know a plane and helicopter cannot move like these things were. they would be so bright and then either fade away upward or just disappear. we had goosebumps and a feeling of awe and apprehension. tonight during and after the fireworks is the most we have seen in a night ever!
content.summary: Looking at the stars and saw yellow/red/white solid basketball size light just speeding acrossed sky, turn and disappear acrossed the sky: moving very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was in jamaica, laying on my back on the north side of the island, montego bay. it was my 4th time there, and i'm no stranger to the sky in this part of the world. it's full of stars just like the rest of the sky. as i laid there and talked with my lady friend, we both watched the sky and talked. i am into naked eye astronomy and indicated not just one but at least 2 satellites directly above us - perhaps at 70deg north over the horizon or so. i'll go to my grave telling people that a life-long interest in space and probably 10-20 times more hours spent looking at the night sky, both with a telescope and without. this is the only thing i have ever seen that i can not explain. there could have been more of these objects but there were at least two. and nobody can explain to me what these were. satellites making 17,500mph right angle turns? satellites that pivot on orbit? a ufo? 2 out of 3 of these things do not exist. i can not identify what i saw, so i am making this report in good faith and with complete honesty.
content.summary: Fast moving object repeatedly changed direction. looked like a satellite.

content.detailedDescription: On back porch with spouse hoping to see fireworks. noted bright star through palm frond. then saw red light and thought it was a plane. observed red light circling white several times. then red light took off quickly to the right, returned to white light, circled it again, then off to the left. white light moved some, but not as much as red. red then seemed to head west to horizon and disappeared. white one then turned red and appeared to have bluish center. it moved back and forth across the sky, then to the horizon. it came back two more times, but alone both times. spouse and i both tried to get video on our phones, but very difficult. i was nervous because my phone has a light and i didn't want to be noticed by these possible ships. also, at one point the second ship appeared to change shape, it almost looked like it had wings with the red light outlining them and it appeared to be floating gently like a parachute. each time this would disappear, it was to the west.I realized the color scheme sounds coincidental, but that is what we both saw, and it was not fireworks. there was no airplane or jet noise. once again, apologies for poor video quality. and, yes, we know there is a big military presence here, but this seemed very out of the ordinary. thanks, hope you hear from other people and this helps you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red pulsing light circled white light, the quickly went left, then right, then to horizon. remaining light turned red with blue center, moved back and forth. returned 2 more times. was not fireworks.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside my house in more of a country area trying to see if any fireworks we're available in the neighborhood for my daughter to watch. i noticed a bright red light out in the distance out to the sw. i noticed it strobe white a few times. we have a plane route in front if the house so i know what they look like. this was no plane. it stayed in the same spot. after 15 minutes i got my wife look with her telescope because no planet should have been in that spot at that time. when she tried to focus we noticed it move a little then descend strait down. that happened very fast. we we're not drinking or under the influence. my wife is a sceptic and even she did not understand the object.
content.summary: Red light with occasional white strope. stayed in same spot for 20 min then decended quickly disappearing

content.detailedDescription: North port object appeared to be an airplane at first then stopped on a fine hovered for a few seconds then ascended rapidly and hovered again then switched direction and disappeared away from us we video recorded it on an iphone because it wasn't normal until we could no longer see it
content.summary: Straight path then hovering then ascending and change direction opposite way

content.detailedDescription: This is the second 4th of july i've seen these objects in the sky. red-orange cube shape. no noise, navigation lights , visibility wings or roto blades. last year observed 5, two of which turned in formation to the west.
content.summary: No sound, nav.Lights, or roto blade noise.  red-orange . speed approx. 50mph.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way to memphis airport traveling south on i-55 by delta refinery. we both noticed lights in the sky through the windshield. as we got closer, i slowed and rolled my window down and stuck my head out to get a better view. it was not moving nor making any sound. i could not believe what i was seeing. seem to be over twice the size of a 737 just hanging there in the sky. shaped like a v made of two rectangles, cut at the ends to make a point. my first thought was to pull over and dig the camera out of our luggage, then thought that would be unwise to do on the expressway. the traffic was light, but it was all tractor trailer rigs. i tried adjusting my left rear view mirror, but could not see it even when i looked back. then, off to my right, some distance away, we saw the same light pattern hanging in the southern sky, too far away see any distinguishable features.

to the best of my memory, i would guess the object was 1 to 1.5k feet up, gray in color with white lights along the lower outer edges except for one red light at the back. i would guess that legs of the v to be 30' to 50' square and 200' to 300' long with the span at the back of the v about 150'. there were two protrusions that i could make out clearly on the bottom of the closest leg. one was a cylindrical shaped and the other was like an inverted fender well or a spare tire carrier.

i am still befuddled about what it was. i swore to myself i will never travel again without a camera ready. to this day, i want to go back and look, camera ready.
content.summary: Traveling south on i-55 by delta refinery my wife and i both spotted the object in the sky through the upper left corner of the windshield. i rolled my window down and slowed up to view it out the drivers side window.

content.detailedDescription: It happened about september 17 1994 at 9:30pm at shawnigan lake there are very few street lights and only one flashing red stop light in the village. my daughter 6 at the time and i were walking down toward the lake front two blocks away to feed my horses . as we were walking in an instant like a void all sound  vanished one second sound then none (i thought wow that's weird) i looked down at my feet as we walked because there was no sound from us walking (i kept thinking boy this is so weird ) i kept looking up then down at my feet in awe when i looked up straight ahead this bright massive white object appeared infront of us it was hovering just over 100 feet away  i stopped in my tracks and bent down to my daughter and pointed my arm at the object and said (look look look) i stood straight up and became scared . i looked left and right to look for a place to hide several times (i thought what do i do what do i do ) then a few seconds later i became mad ( i thought i know who you are and are not going to abduct us and i'm going to get all the information i can against you) after a few seconds a white horizontal beam came on from the last 1/3 of the object i turned my head to see how far the beam shone for i had to turn my whole body but the beam went over past the pine trees so more than  300 feet maybe more the object was so bright that i could see the bark of the pine trees halfway down the 100ft the trees over 100ft away . as i was looking at this object the beam started to move and it went on us . the beam blinded us i had put up my arm to block the light i could not even see my arm . the beam was  very warm . it felt like every atom in my body was vibrating . after a few seconds of this the object took off . i was just stunned of what we just experienced .
content.summary: Massive bright object that turned on a horizontal white beam that moved and enveloped us

content.detailedDescription: Was looking at pictures i was shooting driving down a1a. and we noticed something on the pictures there was an orb.
content.summary: Just saw after i took picture

content.detailedDescription: we had been outside most of the evening watching everyone in our neighborhood pop their fireworks.So when everyone was done, my husband and i decided to go swimming. we were in our backyard, and we noticed 2 star like objects in the ne moving toward the other slowly. then right before they touched, they shot off in a loop. they kept making circles around the other, as if they were playing with each other. this was approximately 9:45-10:45pm and it lasted over 20 minutes. i have always wanted t see a ufo and was shocked that it was finally happening. my mouth was literally on the ground the whole time, and i started screaming to my kids, and anyone that might have been outside," omg!!! everyone look!!! there are 2 ufo's!!" my husband told me to record it on my phone. i realized it was in the bedroom, so i bolted inside to retrieve it. when i returned it was over.
content.summary: Twin ufo?

content.detailedDescription: It was 3:45 am and i was outside looking at the stars. i happened to notice a satellite moving fast above my house then directly behind it a very large triangle shaped object moving quickly, with no sound and no vibration. i did not see any defined shape except three glowing lights that were definitely not stars, and the object changed direction and moved the opposite way above my house. the entire event was over in about 30 seconds. i stared up at the sky for another half hour after, losing sight of it because of all the trees in my yard and surrounding area. at first i was unsure of what i was seeing, then the second time it went over the house i knew exactly what it was, and the fact there was no sound and how fast it moved. i got very excited, but i think i may have gone into a slight trance watching it move overhead. it was there and then it just sort of vanished, like the lights were bright and then they went dim the second time it went by.
content.summary: I saw a triangle shaped ufo appear to be chasing a satellite, and it changed direction above my house then the lights vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I love google earth and exploring my area from my house to the lake and found objects that i can't explain, i snapped several pictures off my cell from my computer, the images seems like someone was trying to cover up if i moved out of a range they looked as if something was shielding them.Almost looks to me like unexplainable objects and under water base
content.summary: I live less than 2 miles from the lake, i went on google earth and went a direct path from my house to the lake and came across unexplainable objects beneath lake erie,

content.detailedDescription: Hi...I'm 24  me and my two friends were just sitting outside of my house having a smoke, then one of my friends noticed it and asked me hey do you know what that is,first i thought it was a plane or satellite, and i replied yes its a ufo its had 3 white lights at each corner of the triangle. as it flew over my house i was in awe!!! excited and amazed , i knew right then and there we weren't alone , the ufo just hovered over made no noise at all , then i chased it to the top of the hill i had sight of it til i got on top as i watched it going to into the clouds it disappeared if it was a plane or any other man made object it would have went through and i would have seen it on the other side ?? and that cloud wasn't even that big. i watch ancient aliens and hangar 1 ufo files and where i am located there is mining sites not to far from here, i noticed in some shows they are showing some interest in our gold etc. also we have aurora lights
content.summary: Black triangle with 3 white lights at each corner ,red orange like light in the middle of the ufo , i'm not really to sure when we seen it i can't recount

content.detailedDescription: Hi...I'm 24  me and my two friends were just sitting outside of my house having a smoke, then one of my friends noticed it and asked me hey do you know what that is,first i thought it was a plane or satellite, and i replied yes its a ufo its had 3 white lights at each corner of the triangle. as it flew over my house i was in awe!!! excited and amazed , i knew right then and there we weren't alone , the ufo just hovered over made no noise at all , then i chased it to the top of the hill i had sight of it til i got on top as i watched it going to into the clouds it disappeared if it was a plane or any other man made object it would have went through and i would have seen it on the other side ?? and that cloud wasn't even that big. i watch ancient aliens and hangar 1 ufo files and where i am located there is mining sites not to far from here, i noticed in some shows they are showing some interest in our gold etc. also we have aurora lights

content.detailedDescription:
From the city of oswego looking south i observed two gold colored balls, adjoined side by side, slowly floating horizontally, moving east to north-east. i would estimate they looked to be about 4 times as close as the distance of a commercial airplane and lower to the ground. i watched it  for about 10 seconds, i lost sight of it behind a tree, then it disappeared.

this case is submitted by fi keith conroy #24457. the witness contacted me by email about this, and investigation is in process.
content.summary: In oswego, ny saw 2 gold colored balls, adjoined side by side slowly floating from e to ne.

content.detailedDescription: Hi...I'm 24  me and my two friends were just sitting outside of my house having a smoke, then one of my friends noticed it and asked me hey do you know what that is,first i thought it was a plane or satellite, and i replied yes its a ufo its had 3 white lights at each corner of the triangle. as it flew over my house i was in awe!!! excited and amazed , i knew right then and there we weren't alone , the ufo just hovered over made no noise at all , then i chased it to the top of the hill i had sight of it til i got on top as i watched it going to into the clouds it disappeared if it was a plane or any other man made object it would have went through and i would have seen it on the other side ?? and that cloud wasn't even that big. i watch ancient aliens and hangar 1 ufo files and where i am located there is mining sites not to far from here, i noticed in some shows they are showing some interest in our gold etc. also we have aurora lights

content.detailedDescription: I just got my youngest daughter inside from a long day i went back outside to smoke a cigarette and noticed something in the corner of my eye fly by very fast at first i thought i was watching to drones but realizing there were no flashing lights also realizing they were very high up in the sky and too fast  i literally froze realizing what i'm seeing is not normal i video taped it for about 15 seconds the first one started to fade away and just disappeared and about 20 seconds the second one just disappeared
content.summary: I had just got my 5 year old daughter in side i went out side to relax from a long day something caught my eye i look up an seen to objects at first i thought it my be a drones but i realized there where no flashing light like a drone an they where to hig

content.detailedDescription: We have seen this every night since the 30th of june 2016. alma texas..It glows in sky like a gold star it seems to get bigger in sky it can maneuver incredible it seems to go out of atmosphere and flys low and slow like it hovers.It also changes from the gold or no lights to lights simular to planes red white and blue. i seen it 4 nights so far and once it was traveling about 10 or 20 mph just above the tree tops. when it got broadside to us it appeared to have some sort of force field shield that domed way around something dark with dome lit up. once in horizon large wings became visable  out past dome or at least appeared but that was june 30 when it flew real low and close to us. in my opinion  it's a govt ship. it goes on a similar flight plan every night and has been seen before dark. i'm going to be out watching tonight to see it again mufon is welcome here to see it. call me
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Witness a ufo or a government ufo

content.detailedDescription: These photos were taken approx 8pm of my daugter. after pulling them up on my pc i noticed the object. there were no "witnesses" as they didn't notice the object until viewing the photos. i believe my daughter used an iphone to take the photos.
content.summary: Photos at sundown unknown until photos viewed on pc

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were enjoying a beautiful clear night sitting outside on our patio around our fire pit.  there were some people lighting off fireworks and we could see them in the distance and hear others close by.  my wife spotted the light first coming up over the trees from the south west.  she asked me "do you see it?"...And "get your phone out!"  i grabbed my phone and started to video it as soon as i could.  it was bright orange and pulsing, this didn't show up on my phone very well until i zoomed in on it.  the object was traveling very fast, it was on what seemed to be an arc or that it was at the same altitude following the curvature of the earth.  i have seen satellites many times and this seemed much closer because the light was so big and bright.  it was not a plane for sure but we could certainly not explain it.  neither of us have ever seen anything like it!  it travelled from sw to nw horizon at about 70 degrees in less than a minute.  we lost sight of it as it either faded then completely disapeard.
content.summary: Pulsating light in sky moving very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling back from ohio to florida and it was dark outside. i was in the back seat watching the stars as we were driving and listening to music when all of sudden i see a bright light about 10 above a 30-40 foot tree. it was a ball, the color was orange. i could tell it was moving at about 30-40 mph as we were traveling at 70 mph on a freeway and it was moving by slow. after we passed it i shouted at my sister to look and she looked back and as she looked back we saw the ball zig-zag super fast. it was so fast it left a light trail, then fade away. she saw it too as she said "wow!" i tried recording it but i just couldn't pull my phone up to do it, something wouldn't let me.
content.summary: Ufo ball floating above tree line zig-zags at light speed leaving a trail

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were taking the dogs out last night july 3'rd 2016 at about 9:30 p.M. when we saw just south of us by the angeles crest forest in acton,california, a very bright white light growing in intensity and then dimming.  my husband saw it first and called me out excitedly to see it.  we scrambled around for our video recorders but batteries were dead!, our phones did not pick up anything.  we did manage to take some long exposure pictures with our manual camera which do not show the shape but captures the movement patterns as well as the intensity of the light.  here, in acton we are away from most of the city lights so it appeared very obvious to us. no shape was apparent until my husband viewed it through his infrared night vision scope...Then we saw it was a saturn-shaped craft that appeared translucent with tentacle-like 'legs' similar to a jellyfish which moved directionally as the craft did..But this was hard to see.  it's surface appeared dull lead grey but also cloud-like at times.  there were 3 round lights on the craft that he saw in his binoculars when it was closer. it started out about 500 ft. or so? from us, lower than any plane would fly but then moved higher and farther away reaching up to an airplane's height. it had no direction or path, it never traveled linear, instead it was bouncing around in a smaller area of the sky ..Up, down, sideways, circular, hovering..All while this intense white light grew larger and brighter, then slowly died down to a single dot, just like a star over and over again.  2 shooting stars appeared around it during this 20 or so minutes we observed it.
content.summary: Saturn shaped bouncing u.F.O.With bright lights and tentacle jellyfish-like 'legs'

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting for the fireworks to start, and i was looking around and something caught my eye to the left. i looked and i noticed objects floating through the sky so i picked my phone up and started filming
 the where reddish glowing objects not in a straight pattern. my feelings were wtf and i was not scared at all i thought it was cool. i thought they were a fleet of ufos. they dissapeared
content.summary: Looked up in the sky untill something caught my eye looked up and saw 9 total in groups of 3 and 2
